LanguageData.Gunsmithing.description: Craft simple and potent firearms like pistols, revolvers and carbines in the machining table.
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.description: Craft low-power blowback-operated automatic firearms like machine pistols, submachine guns and assault carbines at the machining table.
LanguageData.GasOperation.description: Craft high-power automatic and semi-automatic firearms like assault rifles, LMGs, and stronger submachine guns in the machining table or at the modern gunsmith's table.
